'''1.11.4''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released on May 23, 2019,<ref>{{tweet|Mega_Spud|1131593390360018944|You know what that means! We're rolling out a Minecraft hotfix over the next 24 hours - Nintendo Switch users will likely see the update tomorrow if all goes to plan. Changelog:|May 23, 2019}}</ref> which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360028691471-Minecraft-1-11-4-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.11.4 (Bedrock)|date=May 23, 2019}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Mash-up pack]]s'''
* Added the Toy Story mash-up pack.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes on Nintendo Switch that could occur during gameplay, especially surrounding villager job site blocks.
* Fixed issues with Marketplace maps so {{code|villager_v2}} works in command selectors again, targeting both old and new villagers.
